messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Comedian Scott Rogowsky has been traveling on the New York City subway with books that have fake book covers. In a new video, he focuses entirely on Donald Trump, his family, Mike Pence, and some of Trump s top surrogates.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Cecily Strong, appearing as an elector in the scene, answers a knock at her door to find Kate McKinnon as Hillary Clinton. The cards go on to read:  Look, I know I lost the election   And we may never know why.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bernie Sanders was named chair of outreach during a closed-door Senate Democrat caucus meeting. In his new role, Sanders will lead outreach to blue-collar voters, the very voters who became Trump supporters this year.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Steve Bannon was recently appointed as a senior adviser for Trump. As chairman of Breitbart News he is known for his right-winged bias. In this interview he says right- wing women are of the highest moral character.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Obama told everyone at the White House to show Trump s team the same respect he was shown. The look on his face says it all   he s let down, appalled, and terrified for the future of our country.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

John Bennet, a Republican representative from Sallisaw, Oklahoma, crossed the line by calling for the assassination of Hillary Clinton. Bennet is a well-known Islamophobe, and has no concept of what freedom of religion is.
